name: cpp_build_system_errors
description: C++ build system error detection rules

rules.pattern: Could not find a package configuration file provided by|find_package.*not found|CMake.*package.*not.*found
rules.suggestion: Install the missing package or set CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH. Check find_package requirements and paths.
examples: CMake Error: Could not find a package configuration file provided by "Qt5"
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:10 (find_package): Could not find a package
fix_suggestions: Install the missing package using your package manager
Set CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH to include the package location
Check find_package() call for correct package name and version
Verify package is installed in standard locations

rules.pattern: The C\+\+ compiler.*is not able to compile|No CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER could be found|compiler.*not found
rules.description: CMake C++ compiler not found or not working
rules.suggestion: Install a C++ compiler or set CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER to the compiler path
examples: The C++ compiler identification is unknown

rules.pattern: No rule to make target.*needed by|\*\*\* No rule to make target
rules.description: Make target or dependency not found
rules.suggestion: Add the missing target rule to Makefile or check file paths and dependencies
examples: make: *** No rule to make target 'main.o', needed by 'app'

rules.suggestion: Use tabs instead of spaces for recipe lines in Makefile
examples: *** missing separator (did you mean TAB instead of 8 spaces?)

rules.suggestion: Check ninja build file and compilation commands
examples: ninja: error: 'src/main.cpp', needed by 'main.o', missing and no known rule to make it
